headline: Brokers Suggest Investing in Lowe's (LOW): Read This Before Placing a Bet
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Lowe's (LOW) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

headline: Lowe’s pops up at movie theaters with Cinemark popcorn promotion
summary: The two-day Bring Your Own Bucket event sees the retailer continuing to promote its branded containers.

headline: Lowe’s rolls out free offers for customers amid challenges
summary: Lowe’s, like several of its competitors in the home improvement retail space, has struggled with weak consumer demand as a big question mark hovers over the U.S. housing market. In its latest earnings report, Lowe’s revealed that its comparable sales only increased by 0.4% year over year ...
